title: Enforcement Data: Tennessee Lawful Employment Act (HB 1378)

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Enforcement Data: Tennessee Lawful Employment Act (HB 1378)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dates: 2011 - present (broken out by year).

- Total number of tips or complaints received related to employer noncompliance with E-Verify mandates. 

- Total number of investigations and/or audits conducted on employers for E-Verify compliance. 

- Total number of warnings issued to employers for E-Verify noncompliance. 

- Total number of civil fines issued for E-Verify noncompliance. 

- Total dollar amount of civil fines collected in the "lawful employment enforcement fund."

- Total number of cases prosecuted against employers for E-Verify noncompliance. 

If a particular metric is not available/applicable, please proceed with the available data (or the most similar metric).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Michael Macher.

title: Enforcement Data: H.B. 56 (Beason-Hammon Alabama Taxpayer and Citizen Protection Act)

communications.subject: Alabama Open Records Law Request: Enforcement Data: H.B. 56 (Beason-Hammon Alabama Taxpayer and Citizen Protection Act)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Dates: 2011 - present (broken out by year).

- Total number of tips or complaints received related to employer noncompliance with E-Verify mandates.

- Total number of investigations and/or audits conducted on employers for E-Verify compliance.

- Total number of warnings issued to employers for E-Verify noncompliance.

- Total number of civil fines issued for E-Verify noncompliance.

- Total dollar amount of civil fines collected from employers found in violation of E-Verify mandates. 

- Total number of cases prosecuted against employers for E-Verify noncompliance.

If a particular metric is not available/applicable, please proceed with the available data (or the most similar metric).

Please don't hesitate with any questions.

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best,
Michael

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

André Natta, a citizen of Alabama, in coordination with Michael Macher.
